titleStmt.title: Certaine choise grounds, and principles of our Christian religion with their seuerall expositions, set forth in way of questions, and answers: wherein the people of the parish of Northiham, in the county of Sussex, haue beene catechized, and instructed, for the settling of their hearts and mindes, in the mysteries of saluation, and for their better preparation to the Lord's Supper. Now published for their sakes, and for the futher vse of the Church of God. By Iohn Frewen, minister of the Word of God, in that particular congregation.
titleStmt.author: Frewen, John, 1558-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: By G. P[urslowe] for Roger Pott, dwelling at the signe of the Flower-de luce in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Flower-de luce in Pauls Churchyard
